alert.note: Alert for Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...An isolated thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Yuma County through 430 PM MDT... At 358 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking an isolated thunderstorm 5 miles south of Otis, or 12 miles west of Yuma, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph. SOURCE...An automated observation site in Akron measured west northwest winds sustained at 36 mph gusting up to 48 mph at 327 pm MDT. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Yuma. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
